title: Capturing the Magic - A Photographic Journey Through the Walt Disney World Parks
description: A visual journey that will change the way you see the Walt Disney World® Parks, the creators of Capturing the Magic take you on an artful tour through Magic Kingdom Park, Epcot, Disney’s Hollywood Studios and Disney’s Animal Kingdom. With hundreds of stunning photographs of the wondrous landscapes and attractions as well as insider’s wealth of knowledge, it’s almost like being there.Capturing the Magic is a magnificent coffee table book that brings the magic of the Walt Disney World® Parks into the homes of Disney fans worldwide.For every copy of Capturing the Magic sold, the creators will donate a portion of the proceeds to the Make-A-Wish Foundation of America to help make a child’s wish come true. Visit www.capturing-the-magic.com.
author: Holly Wiencek
